alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 23 at 9:55PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Off and on light snow showers will continue across parts of northern and central Nevada this evening... Light snow showers are remaining across portions of northern and central Nevada this evening. Nevada Department of Transportation webcams are showing roads like State Route 225, 227, 228, and portions of US Highway 50 and 93 have snow on them. If driving this evening, please be prepared for winter driving conditions. Roadways may be slick and slushy with snow and water. Please use low beams and reduce speed to arrive safely at your destination. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
